archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: OV Bot
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Goal: The bot automatically pre-verifies the lead, reducing the spent on human resources. Performs the part of routine OVS processes - ﻿verify the lead's proof link, identify NWC status, refresh title info, etc.
Key Features: - updates proof links and most of the information about the lead, ﻿identifies NWC status.
